1.title: Le Petit Train

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Sing along to the Engine Rollcall song in French.

2.title: Edward Laughs at Thomas

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Edward cannot help but laugh at Thomas' extraordinary funnel, but the little blue tank engine manages to rise above the teasing.

3.title: TBT: Hiding Henry

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: To stop the rain from spoiling his lovely green paint and red stripes, Henry hides in a tunnel and refuses to move.

4.title: TBT: Thomas in Trouble

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Thomas gets in trouble with a policeman for not having cowcatchers and sideplates.

5.title: TBT: James' Grumpy Day

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: James is angry because Edward is late again.

6.title: TBT: Edward's Exciting Endeavor

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: After the big engines tease Edward, a driver and fireman feel sorry for him and decides to take him out for a run.

7.title: TBT: Disruptive Delivery

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Some naughty cows stray onto the line and break Edward's train of trucks.

8.title: TBT: Henry's Favorite Forest

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: There is one place on Sodor that Henry loves the most - the forest.

9.title: TBT: Thomas and the Special Announcement

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: The Fat Controller has a plan and summons all his engines to the station.

10.title: Cranky Breaks

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Cranky breaks his crane arm when he tries to lift Thomas.

11.title: Thomas Saves the Clown Show

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Thomas successfully delivers Mr. Bubbles' bubble liquid and saves the children's clown show.

12.title: Thomas and Rosie

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Thomas and Rosie play in a muddy puddle.

13.title: Thomas and the Puddle

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Thomas doesn't think his game of "splish, splash, splosh" is very fun when he races through a muddy puddle and soaks Sir Topham Hatt and Alicia Botti.

14.title: Rocky Helps Thomas

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: After being knocked off the tracks by a giant snowball, Gordon fetches Rocky to lift him back onto the line.

15.title: Hero of the Rails: Thomas and Spencer

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: While racing Spencer across the island, Thomas' brakes fail and he ends up running into a seemingly-deserted woods.

16.title: Hero of the Rails: Thomas Meets Hiro

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Thomas finds an old broken-down engine called Hiro in the woods.

17.title: Hero of the Rails: Thomas Surprises Spencer

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: The morning after their race, Spencer is surprised to see Thomas so cheerful.

18.title: Hero of the Rails: Thomas Tells Victor

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Thomas has to tell Victor about old Hiro. Victor is always happy to help a friend.

19.title: Sir Topham Hatt's Twin

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Thomas mistakes Sir Topham Hatt for his brother, Sir Lowham Hatt. He realizes that he could have avoided a lot of delay if he'd asked a question to start with.

20.title: Bertie Breaks Down

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Thomas finally finds the real Sir Topham Hatt with a broken down Bertie and he is not amused.

21.title: James Painted Pink

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: James is getting a new coat of paint. Workmen just finish his pink undercoat when Sir Topham Hatt sends him on an important job. James is not best pleased.

22.title: Diesel, James, and the Pink Paint Troubles

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Painted pink, James tries to hide from Devious Diesel behind some coal cars.

23.title: Being Percy

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Being small, Percy has trouble being heard at Brendam Docks.

24.title: Edward and Charlie

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Charlie and Edward have a fun time out on the tracks.

25.title: Charlie's Joke

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Charlie thinks Edward is too old to be fun. Edward doesn't agree.

26.title: Being Gordon

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: Percy tries to be just like Gordon.

27.title: Kevin Helps Out

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

27.plot: Kevin has a go at fixing Sir Topham Hatt's car.

28.title: Apologetic Percy's Lesson

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

28.plot: Percy learns that he is perfect just being himself.

29.title: Proud Percy

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

29.plot: Percy puts everything right after a spell of poor behavior.

30.title: Toby & Bash

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

30.plot: After a busy day, Toby takes Bash back to his shed at Arlesdale End.

31.title: James and Toby On Call

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

31.plot: Toby is to assist James who is the rescue engine for the day. James doesn't think he needs help from an old steam tram.

32.title: Percy and the Mail

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

32.plot: Percy is so busy being like Gordon that he steams straight through Maithwaite without stopping to pick up the mail.

33.title: As Good as Gordon

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

33.plot: Feeling as good as Gordon, Percy offers to take Alicia Botti to Knapford.

34.title: Fun Edward

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

34.plot: Trying to show Charlie how much fun he can be, Edward decides to chase after Bertie and the mechanic so that he can fix Sir Topham Hatt's car.

35.title: Thomas Meets the Giraffe

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

35.plot: Thomas has to take a giraffe to the Animal Park, but leaves the docks without waiting for its keeper.

36.title: Thomas and the Giraffe

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

36.plot: When he arrives at a low bridge, Thomas has trouble getting the giraffe to sit down.

37.title: The Snowy Owl

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

37.plot: With the help of James and Thomas, Toby discovers that the Whistling Woods isn't scary after all.

38.title: Edward Feeds the Giraffe

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

38.plot: Edward and Percy gives Thomas' giraffe some apples and leaves to eat, hoping it will persuade the animal to sit down.

39.title: Thomas and the Soccer Team

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

39.plot: Sir Topham Hatt puts Thomas in charge of assigning the engines' jobs on the day of Sodor United's big soccer game.

40.title: The Scaredy Engine

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

40.plot: Toby realizes that you are never too old to ask for help when he gets a fright in the Whistling Woods.

41.title: Trouble at the Animal Park

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

41.plot: When Thomas arrives at the Animal Park, the giraffe he's transporting refuses to wake up. Thomas has to go back to the docks and fetch the animal's keeper.

42.title: The Animal Park

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

42.plot: Thomas collects more leaves and apples for the Animal Park to replace the ones the giraffe ate.

43.title: Emily and Percy's Apple Accident

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

43.plot: Emily and Percy quarrel over a car of apples and it ends up tipping over.

44.title: Gordon and Rocky Rescue Thomas

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

44.plot: Gordon isn't strong enough to rescue Thomas from the snow, so he fetches Rocky.

45.title: Thomas and Rosie's Rainy Day Game

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

45.plot: It's a rainy day on Sodor, but that doesn't bother Thomas and Rosie who decide to play a game with the muddy puddles.

46.title: Thomas and the Piglets

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

46.plot: Farmer Trotter sends Thomas to collect some straw from Farmer McColl for his pigs.

47.title: Thomas and the Buzzy Bees

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

47.plot: Thomas is carrying bees, but he loses them while passing a field of flowers. How can he get them back in their hives?

48.title: Percy's New Friends

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

48.plot: By being quiet and gentle, Percy is able to make friends with some animals in the woods.

49.title: Thomas & His New Tall Friend

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

49.plot: Thomas is given a tall giraffe to take to the Animal Park.

50.title: Thomas and the New Piglets

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

50.plot: Thomas delivers the straw to Farmer Trotter's Pig Farm just in time and soon the new piglets are born.

51.title: Henry's Good Deeds

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

51.plot: Rare bird, the Sodor Warbler, has returned to Sodor and Henry is to deliver a nesting pole to Bluff's Cove for it.

52.title: The Buzzy Bees

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

52.plot: Using a flatbed of flowers as bait, Thomas persuades the bees to return to their hives and he safely takes them to Farmer Trotter.

53.title: Thomas and the Pig Farm

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

53.plot: Of all the farms on the Island of Sodor, Farmer Trotter's Pig Farm is Thomas' favorite and he visits as often as he can.

54.title: Stafford Learns How to Be a Steamie

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

54.plot: Stafford the quiet electric engine wants to make some steam engine noises. Thomas and Percy show him how to do it.

55.title: Stafford Finds Farmer McColl's Lambs

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

55.plot: Stafford scares Farmer McColl's lambs away with his loud steam engine noises. He has to find them by being his quiet self.

56.title: Quiet Stafford the Electric Engine

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

56.plot: Stafford manages to return the lambs to their new home and learns that he is happy being Quiet Stafford, the Electric Engine.

57.title: Cranky and Chaos at Brendam Docks

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

57.plot: Cranky is so busy that Brendam Docks is sent into a state of chaos. Sir Topham Hatt goes to the Steamworks and borrows Kevin to give Cranky a helping hook.

58.title: Gordon's Boiler is Hit!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

58.plot: A stone flies from Paxton's cars and hits Gordon's boiler. Paxton thinks Gordon should be checked over, but stubborn Gordon refuses to listen.

59.title: Paxton and Thomas Over the Bumpy Track

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

59.plot: Paxton and Thomas play around on a stretch of buckled, bumpy track at Knapford Bend. It's not long before disaster strikes.

60.title: The Tale of the Phantom Express

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

60.plot: James tries to scare Percy with his tale of the Phantom Express.

61.title: Who is The Phantom Express?

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

61.plot: After scaring Stephen and Percy, James starts to believe his own scary story of the Phantom Express.

62.title: The Ghost Hunt

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

62.plot: James and Sir Topham Hatt go on a hunt for the Phantom Express around Ulfstead Castle and find Percy and Stephen in the dry moat.

63.title: Kevin Meets Cranky

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

63.plot: Kevin arrives at Brendam Docks to help out, but Cranky is not pleased to see him.

64.title: Gordon's Dry Boiler

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

64.plot: Gordon upsets his express passengers when he keeps stopping to take on water. Trying to make up for lost time, Gordon decides to try and think about something else.

65.title: Thomas Lost His Puff!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

65.plot: Paxton goes in search of Thomas' "lost puff".

66.title: Two Hooks Are Better Than One

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

66.plot: Cranky finally allows Kevin to help him with the workload down at Brendam Docks.

67.title: Gordon Runs Out of Steam

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

67.plot: Gordon's boiler finally runs dry and Paxton has to push the pompous express engine to the Steamworks.

68.title: Thomas Finds His Puff

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

68.plot: Paxton goes to the Steamworks to see if Victor has any spare "puff" for Thomas. He is left looking foolish when he is told that "puff" is just another word for "steam".

69.title: The Great Western Way

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

69.plot: Harold has broken down. Thomas and Duck have to take him to the Search and Rescue Center by rail. Thomas wants to show Harold some sights, but Duck wants to go directly to their destination.

70.title: Is Thomas Slowing Down?

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

70.plot: Due to him being re-routed, Bertie is able to regularly beat Thomas to the level crossing.

71.title: Wobbly Winston

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

71.plot: Winston is tired of the way the engines tease him for Sir Topham Hatt's bad driving.

72.title: Thomas Plays a Trick on Duck

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

72.plot: Thomas wants to show Harold the inside of Knapford Station so he tricks Duck into going there. Disaster nearly strikes when Harold is too big to fit under the roof.

73.title: Thomas Creates a Shortcut

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

73.plot: To beat Bertie to the level crossing, Thomas goes looking for a shortcut on his branch line but only ends up causing a delay for his passengers.

74.title: Steam Team Holidays: Thomas and the Lost Snowplow

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

74.plot: Thomas doesn't like wearing his snowplow, so he hides it in a siding. When the snow falls, Emily has to clear the branch line while Thomas is snug and warm in the shed.

75.title: Steam Team Holidays: The Frozen Turntable at Tidmouth Sheds

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

75.plot: Due to a frozen turntable at Tidmouth Sheds, the engine have to look for alternative shelters.

76.title: Steam Team Holidays: Who Took the Steamies' Decorations?

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

76.plot: Diesel 10 starts stealing the steam engines' Christmas decorations from Tidmouth Sheds to decorate the Dieselworks.

77.title: Steam Team Holidays: Winston is Santa's Sleigh

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

77.plot: Sir Topham Hatt is asked to dress up as Santa Claus and is going to be getting a sleigh. Sir Topham isn't pleased about this and decides to convert Winston into a sleigh instead.

78.title: Steam Team Holidays: The Search for Thomas' Snowplow

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

78.plot: Thomas finds it boring in the shed and sets off to find his snowplow, but the snow has covered it up and he can't see it anywhere.

79.title: Steam Team Holidays: Gordon is Stuck in Tidmouth Sheds!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

79.plot: Gordon selfishly takes the one available berth at Tidmouth Sheds and ends up stuck inside when the frozen turntable moves slightly.

80.title: Steam Team Holidays: How Diesel 10 Stole Christmas

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

80.plot: Percy catches Diesel 10 stealing garland and soon the whole Steam Team is chasing him across the island to the Dieselworks.

81.title: Steam Team Holidays: Sir Topham Hatt's Christmas Sleigh

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

81.plot: Sir Topham Hatt is not best pleased to see the sleigh that the Earl has ordered for him to use.

82.title: Steam Team Holidays: Thomas is Stuck in the Snow!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

82.plot: Without his snowplow, Thomas soon gets stuck in the snow.

83.title: The Tables Have Turned for Gordon

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

83.plot: As he is stuck in the sheds, Gordon's express train is given to James. When he is freed from the shed, Sir Topham Hatt has Gordon take Percy's mail train to make up for his day wasted in the shed.

84.title: How Percy Got Sidney His New Wheels

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

84.plot: Percy gets Sidney the best Christmas present of all - some new wheels so that he can be really useful again.

85.title: Steam Team Holidays: Thomas Saves Santa's Sleigh!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

85.plot: Thomas comes to Sir Topham Hatt's rescue when he slides away in a Christmas sleigh dressed as Santa Claus.

86.title: Three Ways of Doing Things

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

86.plot: After delivering Harold to the Search and Rescue Center, Duck concludes there might be three ways of doing things; the Great Western way, the wrong way and the Thomas way.

87.title: Thomas Gets Derailed

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

87.plot: Thomas comes off the rails while looking for a shortcut. When he is rescued, Thomas vows to stick to his branch line from now on.

88.title: Sir Topham Hatt Back in the Driving Seat

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

88.plot: Runaway Winston finally runs out of gas and is pleased to have Sir Topham Hatt back in the driving seat once again.

89.title: Sodor's Two Fire Engines

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

89.plot: Sir Topham Hatt shows off Belle and Flynn to three railway inspectors.

90.title: The Troublesome Trucks & the Master of the Railway

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

90.plot: Diesel roughly shunts Hiro's trucks and causes the milk churns to leak. When Hiro delivers the trucks to Knapford, the milk leaks out and spills over Sir Topham Hatt's trousers.

91.title: Salty & Porter

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

91.plot: Salty is feeling under the weather, but doesn't want to be checked over for fear he'll be sent away from the docks. He is even more rattled when a new engine named Porter arrives.

92.title: James' Scary Stories

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

92.plot: The engines challenge James to pull the Flying Kipper to prove he isn't scared of his own stories. James excepts the challenge until he realizes how smelly fish can be.

93.title: Fiery Flynn and Belle

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

93.plot: Flynn is depressed when Belle extinguishes a fire without him. He begins to think that the inspectors may have been right; Sodor might only need one fire engine.

94.title: Hiro and the Troublesome Diesel

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

94.plot: Sneaky Diesel tries to show Hiro just how troublesome trucks can be.

95.title: James is Scared of the Smelly Fish!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

95.plot: To make up for his broken promise, Sir Topham Hatt makes James take the smelly Flying Kipper train that night whether he likes it or not.

96.title: Fiery Flynn to the Rescue!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

96.plot: While Belle is busy keeping an eye on the fireworks at Ulfstead Castle, Flynn finally manages to prove that you can never have too many fire engines.

97.title: Salty Sets Sail Back to the Docks

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

97.plot: Salty is soon repaired and heading back to Brendam Docks, but he collides with some oil drums and soon starts slipping along the tracks.

98.title: Master of the Railway

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

98.plot: Sir Topham Hatt has Hiro teach Diesel the proper way to handle Troublesome Trucks.

99.title: Salty & Porter Down at the Docks

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

99.plot: Porter saves Salty from a nasty accident and they become great dockside friends.

100.title: James's Fishy Situation

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

100.plot: After pulling the Flying Kipper, James returns to the sheds smelling of fish.

101.title: Harvey & Porter

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

101.plot: Bill and Ben tease Harvey and Porter down at Brendam Docks. Porter takes no notice, to him it's just water off a duck's back.

102.title: Stephen, The Rocket

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

102.plot: Tired of Spencer's teasing, Stephen wants to prove that he can be the fastest afternoon tea express ever.

103.title: The Bad Coal Delivery

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

103.plot: After taking on some bad coal, Henry decides to leave Hiro until new coal arrives, but Hiro continues on delivering the important cargo.

104.title: Luke & His New Friend

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

104.plot: A young deer has found its way to the Blue Mountain Quarry and Luke gets to see it up close.

105.title: Harvey and His Engine

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

105.plot: Harvey tries pulling a train of flatbeds to Vicarstown.

106.title: Stephen, The Rocket Again

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

106.plot: Stephen is going fast again due to the other engines giving him a push. However, one day, Stephen can't find any engines around so has to trick Spencer into giving him a push.

107.title: Hiro Keeps on Puffing

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

107.plot: Hiro, still burning bad coal, is given another important job, but he will need to persuade reluctant Henry to help him.

108.title: The Quarry is No Place for a Deer

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

108.plot: Working quietly so as not to startle the young deer is more difficult than it sounds for the vehicles at the Blue Mountain Quarry.

109.title: Harvey, The Really Useful Engine

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

109.plot: Harvey proves that it is doubly useful to be both a crane and an engine when he has an accident on the way to Vicarstown with his flatbeds.

110.title: The Afternoon Tea Tour

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

110.plot: Spencer pushes Stephen too fast and he can't stop in time to avoid a collision with some buffers at Ulfstead Castle.

111.title: Henry Keeps on Puffing

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

111.plot: When Hiro finally break down, Henry manages to push Hiro and all the heavy flatbeds to the docks.

112.title: Luke & Young Deer

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

112.plot: Luke's deer friend is reunited with its mother during a trip to Ulfstead Castle.

113.title: Luke & Millie

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

113.plot: Luke and Millie decide to swap jobs for the day with Millie going to the Blue Mountain Quarry and Luke working on the Earl's estate at Ulfstead Castle.

114.title: Caitlin's Night on the Island of Sodor

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

114.plot: Excitable Caitlin offers to take Percy's mail train, but she has a problem keeping quiet.

115.title: Luke & Millie Switch Jobs

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

115.plot: Luke and Millie learn a lot from their job swapping, but are both glad to go back to normal at the end of the day.

116.title: Caitlin Up All Night

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

116.plot: Caitlin, having been awake all night pulling the mail and the Flying Kipper, she finds it hard to stay awake the next day.

117.title: Dirty Scruff

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

117.plot: Sir Topham Hatt orders scruffy Scruff to be repainted and the dirty, little engine isn't happy about it at all.

118.title: Charlie's Elephant Jokes

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

118.plot: After spending the day telling jokes about elephants, Charlie finds a real live one beside the line.

119.title: The New, Stylish Scruff

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

119.plot: After Scruff is repainted, he thinks he is too smart and shiny to work at the waste dump and looks for a job elsewhere.

120.title: The Engine That Cried Elephant

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

120.plot: No-one will believe Charlie when he says that he has seen a real, live elephant alongside the railway line.

121.title: Scruff, The Really Useful Engine

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

121.plot: Scruff learns that he may be smart and clean, but if he doesn't do his job, he can't be really useful.

122.title: Charlie Rescues the Elephant

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

122.plot: Charlie and Harold find the elephant and return it safely to the Animal Park. After the eventful day, Charlie vows never to tell a joke again, but that decision doesn't last very long.

123.title: Bill or Ben?

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

123.plot: Bill and Ben see Connor for the first time and decide to play a trick on him.

124.title: Percy's Unlucky Day

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

124.plot: Percy begins to believe he is an unlucky engine after a spell of bad luck.

125.title: Connor Meets Bill and Ben

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

125.plot: Connor realizes that Bill and Ben are two different engines and, after nearly causing an accident, Sir Topham Hatt decides to put an end to their tricks once and for all.

126.title: Percy's Lucky Charm

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

126.plot: Percy is given a lucky horseshoe to combat his spell of bad luck. His day seems to take a happy turn afterwards, but he doesn't know that the horseshoe had fallen off as soon as he'd got it.

127.title: Bill and Ben's New Color

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

127.plot: Ben, pretending to be Bill, tricks Kevin into having him painted the same color as his twin again so that they can play tricks on Connor once again.

128.title: Percy Finds His Strength

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

128.plot: Percy is able to save the day even without his lucky charm. He realizes that he can make his own luck just by being a really useful engine.

129.title: Stuck on Gordon's Hill

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

129.plot: Gordon stops on his hill and cannot start again with the heavy express holding him back. Old Edward is called to help.

130.title: Not Too Fast and Not Too Slow

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

130.plot: When Annie and Clarabel keep complaining about Thomas' speed, the cheeky tank engine decides to have some fun.

131.title: The Tale of the Flatbeds of Fear

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

131.plot: Salty frightens Thomas with his tale of the Flatbeds of Fear.

132.title: Diesel's Disappearing Joke

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

132.plot: Diesel makes all the other diesels hide from Paxton for a joke, but Paxton is worried when he can't find any of his friends.

133.title: Gordon Learns His Lesson

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

133.plot: Thomas plays a trick on Gordon so that he will learn not to be so rude to Edward.

134.title: Henry is Haunted by the Flatbeds of Fear

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

134.plot: Henry hears a spooky noise and, believing it's the Flatbeds of Fear, goes onto a siding and refuses to move.

135.title: Paxton Makes Diesel Smile

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

135.plot: Despite being unkind to Paxton, Diesel is surprised by Paxton's display of kindness when he runs out of fuel.

136.title: Where is Toby's Signal?

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

136.plot: Even with Henrietta's help, Toby cannot navigate his way through the many signals of Knapford Junction.

137.title: The Truth About the Flatbeds of Fear

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

137.plot: Thomas learns that the spooky noise isn't the Flatbeds of Fear - it's actually just the wind whistling through the pipes.

138.title: Toad Saves the Day!

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

138.plot: Toad bravely manages to stop some runaway cars from colliding with Thomas who is carrying Sir Topham and Dowager Hatt.

139.title: Toby's Red Signal

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

139.plot: Toby finally learns his signals and even spots one that is faulty.

140.title: Duck's Rocky Rescue

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

140.plot: Duck is stuck in a flood and James collects Rocky to rescue him. Unfortunately, James doesn't wait for Rocky's crane arm to be secured and the big crane knocks over a signal.

141.title: Toad's Great Adventure

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

141.plot: Toad impresses several engines with the tale of his daring adventure.

142.title: Duck and the Great Western Slip Coaches

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

142.plot: Duck tells the engines all about slip coaches which can be uncoupled at stations without stopping.

143.title: Duncan is Grumpy, Just Like His Passenger

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

143.plot: Duncan is a very grumpy engine and, today, he has a very grumpy passenger.

144.title: Duncan Hates the Holidays - Bah Humbug

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

144.plot: Duncan makes all the engines unhappy with his constant complaining about the Christmas period on the narrow gauge railway.

145.title: Thomas the Quarry Engine Challenge

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

145.plot: Thomas is left alone at the quarry when Mavis and Diesel head off to the docks with cars full of stone.

146.title: Percy Cheers Reg Up for the Holidays

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

146.plot: Percy is worried that Reg the scrapyard crane is missing out on Christmas.

147.title: Marion and the Leaky Water Pipe

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

147.plot: Marion accidentally breaks a water pipe and tries to cover it up.

148.title: Percy's Perfect Christmas Gift

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

148.plot: Percy gives Reg the best Christmas present of all - more lovely scrap. Reg gives Percy a star made from scrap in return.

149.title: Marion and the Water Pipe Repairs

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

149.plot: The leaky water pipe causes problems for Marion, but she manages to save the day just in time.

150.title: Percy Misses Gator

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

150.plot: Percy misses his friend Gator and vows to keep his mind off things by keeping busy.

151.title: Bill and Ben Cause Trouble for Marion

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

151.plot: Ben forgets to collect the coal for the engines at the China Clay Pits which has Marion very concerned.

152.title: Sir Topham Hatt Gives His Engines a Second Chance

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

152.plot: While trying to impress the Deputy Minister, Sir Topham Hatt's engines make a lot of mistakes. Sir Topham and the Minister decide to give the engines a second chance.

153.title: Bill and Ben Run Out of Steam

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

153.plot: Timothy the oil-burning engine has to fetch coal for Bill and Ben when the two cheeky twins run out.

154.title: Toad's Bright Idea to Fix Gator's Lamp

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

154.plot: Toad is not pleased when Gator's lamp keeps going out. Eventually, Gator has enough of Toad's complaining and decides to leave him behind.

155.title: Gator's Return to Sodor

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

155.plot: Gator makes his return to the Island of Sodor.

156.title: Duck Saves the Day for the Slip Coaches

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

156.plot: James' inexperience with the Slip Coaches shows and experienced Duck steps in.

157.title: Gator Borrows Toad's Lamp

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

157.plot: Gator borrows one of Toad's lamps and the pair manage to deliver their cars to the docks.

158.title: Percy Worries Gator Forgot About Him

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

158.plot: Percy is worried that Gator doesn't want to see him, but realizes it has all been a misunderstand. Percy rushes to the docks, but fears he may be too late to stop Gator from going home again.

159.title: Duncan Changes His Grumpy Ways

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

159.plot: Duncan tries to impress his grumpy passenger, but makes everyone else miserable in doing so.

160.title: Thomas and the Birdwatcher Emergency

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

160.plot: A birdwatcher pulls the emergency cord in error and Annie ends up developing a wheel flat.

161.title: James and the Blunders of Impatience

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

161.plot: James takes responsibility for an accident involving a fallen signal pole.

162.title: Percy and Gator's Advice Rescue the Troublesome Trucks

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

162.plot: Gator's advice helps Percy to rescue some runaway trucks.

163.title: Thomas Tries to Pull the Troublesome Trucks

episode of.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (TV Series 2010– )

163.plot: Thomas takes a long line of heavy stone cars without waiting for a back engine and soon runs into trouble.

imdb.title: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US)
akas: The Best of Thomas & Friends Clips (US) (United Kingdom)
plot: Relive some of Thomas' most memorable moments with these clips from the American dub of Thomas and Friends.::Anonymous
